net.sf.JRecord.schema

Class CobolSchemaDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.schema.CobolSchemaDetails

  • public final class CobolSchemaDetails
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Holds
    • JRecord schema (LayoutDetail)
    • "Cobol Item Tree" for each Record
    • "Cobol Copybook definition
    • An IOBuilder
    • General Copybook Information
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

    • Field Detail

      • schema

        public final LayoutDetail schema
        Standard JRecord schema

      • recordItems

        public final java.util.List<net.sf.JRecord.schema.jaxb.ItemRecordDtls> recordItems
        Holds a list of Cobol-Item-Tree's one for each record in the JRecord-Schema (LayoutDetail). Each "Item" holds the Cobol-Field + JRecord Field definition/Array Details 
         So that
   
     JRecord Schema                           Cobol "Item" tree
    +--------------+                         +-----------------+    
   schema.getRecord(index)      <--->       recordItems.get(index)

      • ioBuilder

        public final ISchemaIOBuilder ioBuilder
        IOBuilder for the schema

      • copybookInformation

        public final ISchemaInformation copybookInformation
        Adhoc Schema (Cobol Copybook) information
